shape

Class ComposedShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape.ComposedShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>, Shape

    public class ComposedShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    Fits small shapes inside container shapes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tolga Reis
